question: Which of the following movements of Satyagraha was held in Nagpur in 1923?
explanation: Flag Satyagrahas were conducted most notably in the city of Nagpur in 1923. Flag Satyagraha was a campaign that focused on exercising the right and freedom to hoist the nationalist flag and challenge the legitimacy of the British Rule in India through the defiance of laws prohibiting the hoisting of nationalist flags and restricting civil freedoms.
